snippet: Supreme Court justices struggled to strike the right balance between avoiding government interference in religious groups while protecting employees from discrimination.
lead_paragraph: Supreme Court justices struggled to strike the right balance between avoiding government interference in religious groups while protecting employees from discrimination.

headline.main: Religious Groups and Bias Get the Justices’ Attention
headline.print_headline: Religious Groups and Bias Get the Justices’ Attention
headline.seo: Supreme Court Puzzles Over Religious Groups and Bias
